text: Kol Yisrael (; lit. "Voice of Israel", also "Israel Radio") is the national radio station in Israel. It is operated under the the country's public broadcasting service. "Kan Reka" is one of Kol Yisrael's radio stations, and is broadcasting in 10 languages, including English, Spanish, Russian and more. == Other websites == *Kan REKA - the international radio station of Kol Israel. Category:Radio stations Category:Mass media in Israel Category:1947 establishments in Asia Category:1940s establishments in Israel
title: Kol Yisrael
